messages.content:
Generate a clean HTML table as a mind map.

- Top row: main topic (centered, bold, with emoji).
- Below: subtopics and details in rows.
- Show hierarchy visually.
- Use <b> for key terms.
- Use 1 emoji per item (topic, subtopic, detail).
- Keep text concise.
- Return only valid HTML code (<table>, <tr>, <td>), no extra text.
everything with the following text
 {{7.data}}
